title: where are my key fragments
body: i havent recived  key fragments from 5 or more days and iv played like at least 30 or more games can i know why please ?  (and im honor level  2)

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and see you've collected around 8 hextech fragments so far in the last 2 weeks.  The rate of hextech key fragments have not changed with the new honor system.  The only difference is the addition of more keys via level 3 Capsules.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you should see about 12 about every month.  Hope that helps clear things up!
so that means that im going to see more hextech items in august ?
Yup!  Per the guide you'll get roughly 12 every 28 days.  Once you get to Honor level 3, you'll also have a chance for capsules with even more, which does not count towards the 12!
yaay but il probaly not even make it to level 3 :p
